alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 6:27PM CDT until April 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LAWRENCE AND WESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wanilla, or 17 miles south of Pinola, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Progress around 640 PM CDT. Prentiss around 650 PM CDT. Carson around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Silver Creek. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
